DOC.brief_summary: The aim randomize clinical trial evaluate effect pH fluoride concentration liquid dentifrice control dental caries early childhood , non-fluoridated area . This study also aim assess effect consistency liquid dentifrice fluoride uptake plaque fluoride concentration toenail , estimate fluoride intake formulation .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Low Fluoride Dentifrice Caries Control
DOC.detailed_description: The study carry schoolchildren live non-fluoridated area , ( A ) without ( I ) active caries lesion , randomly allocate 3 group accord LD use 12 month : Group 1 ( n=39-A/38-I ) : 550µgF/g-pH4.5 , Group 2 ( n=33-A/35-I ) 1100µgF/g-pH7.0 , Group 3 ( n=33-A/34-I ) : 550µgF/g-pH7.0 .
DOC.criteria: Age 2 4 year ; Not participate clinical study within 3 month prior selection ; Not large carious lesion dentin sensitivity study ; Signature inform consent parent . Using orthodontic appliance
